messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
It's 188 and 92 Indian Springs.
Okay. What's going on there?
I just shot my mother and my nephew.
You shot your mother and your nephew?
Yes, I committed a double homicide.
Okay. Do you know if they are alive at this point?
I don't think so. I shot them multiple times.
Okay. What's your name?
My name is Adrian Graham Wallace.
Where are you right now, sir?
I'm at my home.
What did you shoot them with?
A rifle.
Where is the gun now?
It's on the ground, near the homicide scene.
Is it inside the house or outside?
It's in the front of the house.
Are you inside now?
I'm in the garage, smoking a cigarette. My last cigarette, I suppose.
Are you armed at all now?
No. If the cops treat me with respect, I'll go ahead and be a prisoner.
Is anybody else there with you?
No.
Can I ask your date of birth?
I don't remember. 1971, I think.
Okay. So you said that you went crazy, you had some kind of mental break?
Well, I'm going to open the garage door. I can't believe I did what I did.
Okay. I want to help you as much as I can. Whatever you need to tell me...
No, I did what I did. People are dead. It's a criminal act, I committed a crime.
We don't know that. We might be able to help them still.
People are dead.
Okay. I'm trying to help you.
Multiple repeated crimes, child abuse, stuff like that.
Against you?
Why are you asking me this stuff? Just arrest me. Throw me in a cage.
Sir, I'm sending people to come help you, okay? They are on the way.
I just committed a double homicide.
I understand. They are coming to help you.
Just give me a cop. I surrender.
They are coming as fast as they can, I promise you that.
I was an abused child. My family lied about it, and I snapped.
Okay. I hear you. I'm sending officers to you.
Just kill me because I'm not going to kill myself.
We don't want to kill you either.
Yes, you do.
No, sir, we do not. What has happened to you is horrible.
What part of double homicide do you not understand?
I understand. I know that you had to be hurting to do what you did.
I used to be the good guy. I used to help people. Now I'm a murderer.
I understand that you have done something wrong.
Do you understand that I just killed two people?
Yes, I do. I'm hearing you.
Then a bunch of scumbags made it impossible for me. Betrayed me for the last time.
I understand. And like I said, officers are on the way.
They're not going to sneak up on me.
They know that you're aware they are coming.
Give me handcuffs and a prison cell. Shoot me in the head.
Nobody wants to kill you.
Yes, you do.
Nobody wants you dead. What has happened to you is horrible.
